title: Pset_DiscreteAccessoryLadderTrussConnector
description: Shape properties specific to connecting accessories in truss form with straight cross-bars in ladder shape.

LadderTrussHeight.title: LadderTrussHeight
LadderTrussHeight.description: The overall height of the truss connector.

LadderTrussLength.title: LadderTrussLength
LadderTrussLength.description: The overall length of the truss connector.

LadderTrussCrossBarSpacing.title: LadderTrussCrossBarSpacing
LadderTrussCrossBarSpacing.description: The spacing between the straight cross-bars.

LadderTrussBaseBarDiameter.title: LadderTrussBaseBarDiameter
LadderTrussBaseBarDiameter.description: The nominal diameter of the base bar.

LadderTrussSecondaryBarDiameter.title: LadderTrussSecondaryBarDiameter
LadderTrussSecondaryBarDiameter.description: The nominal diameter of the secondary bar.

LadderTrussCrossBarDiameter.title: LadderTrussCrossBarDiameter
LadderTrussCrossBarDiameter.description: The nominal diameter of the straight cross-bars.
